title: This Apartment has Everything!
map_address: 8801 West Belleview Avenue near Wadsworth & Belleview
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Easy Mountain and City Access in Littleton', 'Come home from a busy day to the serenity of towering shade trees and inviting mountain views.', 'Your one-bedroom or two-bedroom apartment at Cottonwood Creek is perfectly positioned between Denver and the mountains, with easy access via I-25 or C-470.', 'Great floor plans, spacious closets, individual washers and dryers, reserved, covered parking, a sparkling pool with sun deck, and lots of green space are some of the things you’ll love about living here.', 'Come check out our community.', 'But be forewarned: you won’t want to leave!', 'Where you live matters.', 'At RedPeak, we’re committed to delivering the best Denver-area living experiences because this is where we live, where we were founded, and where we’re solely focused.', 'We’re not a company that just manages properties.', 'We own every one of our buildings, and truly care about our communities and the people who call them home.', "Continue below for more on Denver's Littleton area, as well as what amenities await you at Cottonwood Creek.", 'To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!',
